Articles.Content:
BluPlanet Incorporated presents yet another launcher from startreader. Named after the daughter of Atlas, Hyas I is designed to be beginner-friendly. This slim light lifter fits most beginner tasks, from launching satellites to small exploration vehicles.

Download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/5xrzsjpmpae8yv8/Hyas%20I.craft

Enjoy! CREDIT: Startreader
